description: This file defines a Java record class 'FlightUpdateRequest' in the package 'com.example.flightstatusservice.flights.dto'. It serves as a data transfer object (DTO) for updating flight details, including fields like airline code, flight number, flight date, origin and destination airports, and scheduled departure and arrival times. It utilizes validation annotations and Swagger schema annotations.

classes.name: FlightUpdateRequest
classes.description: A record used to encapsulate data for updating flight information, with validation constraints and schema annotations.
